verses.verse: And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> again <WH3254> did <WH6213> that which was evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of Jehovah <WH3068>; and Jehovah <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>.

And there was a certain <WH259> man <WH376> of Zorah <WH6881>, of the family <WH4940> of the Danites <WH1839>, whose name <WH8034> was Manoah <WH4495>; and his wife <WH802> was barren <WH6135>, and bare not <WH3205>.

And the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> unto the woman <WH802>, and said <WH559> unto her <WH6135>, Behold now, thou art barren, and bearest <WH3205> not <WH2029>; but thou shalt conceive, and bear <WH3205> a son <WH1121>.
Now therefore beware <WH8104>, I pray thee <WH8354>, and drink no wine <WH3196> nor strong drink <WH7941>, and eat <WH398> not any unclean thing <WH2931>:

for <WH2030>, lo, thou shalt conceive, and bear <WH3205> a son <WH1121>; and no razor <WH4177> shall come <WH5927> upon his head <WH7218>; for the child <WH5288> shall be a Nazirite <WH5139> unto God <WH430> from the womb <WH990>: and he shall begin <WH2490> to save <WH3467> Israel <WH3478> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>.

Then the woman <WH802> came <WH935> and told <WH559> her husband <WH376>, saying <WH559>, A man <WH376> of God <WH430> came <WH935> unto me <WH4758>, and his countenance was like the countenance <WH4758> of the angel <WH4397> of God <WH430>, very <WH3966> terrible <WH3372>; and I asked <WH7592> him not whence he was <WH5046>, neither told he me his name <WH8034>:

but he said <WH559> unto me <WH2030>, Behold, thou shalt conceive, and bear <WH3205> a son <WH1121>; and now drink <WH7941> no wine <WH3196> nor strong drink <WH8354>, and eat <WH398> not any unclean <WH2932> thing <WH5288>; for the child shall be a Nazirite <WH5139> unto God <WH430> from the womb <WH990> to the day <WH3117> of his death <WH4194>.

Then Manoah <WH4495> entreated <WH6279> Jehovah <WH3068>, and said <WH559>, Oh <WH994>, Lord <WH3068>, I pray thee <WH4994>, let the man <WH376> of God <WH430> whom thou didst send <WH7971> come again <WH935> unto us <WH3384>, and teach us what we shall do <WH6213> unto the child <WH5288> that shall be born <WH3205>.

And God <WH430> hearkened <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of Manoah <WH4495>; and the angel <WH4397> of God <WH430> came again <WH935> unto the woman <WH802> as she sat <WH3427> in the field <WH7704>: but Manoah <WH4495> her husband was not with her <WH376>.

And the woman <WH802> made haste <WH4116>, and ran <WH7323>, and told <WH5046> her husband <WH376>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH376>, Behold, the man hath appeared <WH7200> unto me <WH935>, that came unto me the other day <WH3117>.

And Manoah <WH4495> arose <WH6965>, and went <WH3212> after <WH310> his wife <WH802>, and came <WH935> to the man <WH376>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH376>, Art thou the man that spakest <WH1696> unto the woman <WH802>? And he said <WH559>, I am.
And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559>, Now let thy words <WH1697> come to pass <WH935>: what shall be the ordering <WH4941> of the child <WH5288>, and how shall we do unto him <WH4639>?
And the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Manoah <WH4495>, Of all that I said <WH559> unto the woman <WH802> let her beware <WH8104>.

She may not eat <WH398> of anything that cometh <WH3318> of the vine <WH1612>, neither let her drink <WH8354> wine <WH3196> or strong drink <WH8354>, nor eat <WH398> any unclean <WH2932> thing <WH6680>; all that I commanded her let her observe <WH8104>.
And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559> unto the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068>, I pray thee <WH6113>, let us detain thee <WH6213>, that we may make ready a kid <WH1423> for thee <WH6440>.

And the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Manoah <WH4495>, Though thou detain <WH6113> me <WH398>, I will not eat of thy bread <WH3899>; and if <WH518> thou wilt make ready <WH6213> a burnt-offering <WH5930>, thou must offer <WH6213> it unto Jehovah <WH3068>. For Manoah <WH4495> knew <WH3045> not that he was the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559> unto the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068>, What is thy name <WH8034>, that <WH1697>, when thy words come to pass <WH935>, we may do thee honor <WH3513>?
And the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto him <WH7592>, Wherefore askest thou after my name <WH8034>, seeing it is wonderful <WH6383>?

So Manoah <WH4495> took <WH3947> the kid <WH1423> with the meal-offering <WH4503>, and offered <WH5927> it upon the rock <WH6697> unto Jehovah <WH3068>: and the angel did <WH6213> wondrously <WH6381>, and Manoah <WH4495> and his wife <WH802> looked on <WH7200>.

For it came to pass <WH3851>, when the flame went up <WH5927> toward heaven <WH8064> from off the altar <WH4196>, that the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068> ascended <WH5927> in the flame <WH3851> of the altar <WH4196>: and Manoah <WH4495> and his wife <WH802> looked on <WH7200>; and they fell on <WH7200> their faces <WH6440> to the ground <WH776>.

But the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068> did no more <WH3254> appear <WH7200> to Manoah <WH4495> or to his wife <WH802>. Then Manoah <WH4495> knew <WH3045> that he was the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559> unto his wife <WH802>, We shall surely <WH4191> die <WH4191>, because we have seen <WH7200> God <WH430>.

But his wife <WH802> said <WH559> unto him <WH3863>, If Jehovah <WH3068> were pleased <WH2654> to kill <WH4191> us <WH3947>, he would not have received a burnt-offering <WH5930> and a meal-offering <WH5930> at our hand <WH3027>, neither would he have showed <WH7200> us all these things <WH6256>, nor would at this time have told <WH8085> such things as these <WH2063>.
And the woman <WH802> bare <WH3205> a son <WH1121>, and called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Samson <WH8123>: and the child <WH5288> grew <WH1431>, and Jehovah <WH3068> blessed him <WH1288>.
And the Spirit <WH7307> of Jehovah <WH3068> began <WH2490> to move <WH6470> him in <WH4264> Mahaneh-dan <WH1835>, between Zorah <WH6881> and Eshtaol <WH847>.
